summary: This is a small color retext of the Dragon Priests within the game. It conjures a more \"Hellish\" look for these specific actors.
descriptionHtml:
V1.0.1
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{4/12/12} 
 - A more desaturated version (1.0.1) will be on the way. Also, the annoying white line outlines will be gone.
 - New VERSION 1.0.1 has been released today! It is much less saturated than the previous version. It also uses a different set of gradients as well.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a small color retext of the Dragon Priests within the game. It conjures a more \"Hellish\" 
look for these specific actors.
1024x1024
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other textures!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14980]Hellish Draugr![/url]

author: VarCryne
